document.discussion_title: Prince death: Powerful drugs found in singer's home 'were mislabelled'
document.topic_text: Pills seized from the home of singer Prince contained the dangerously powerful synthetic opioid fentanyl but were mislabelled, according to reports. »
document.post: Pills seized from the home of singer Prince contained the dangerously powerful synthetic opioid fentanyl but were mislabelled, according to reports. »
